tag_list: investor, entrepreneur, angel-investor, video, ceo, startup
overview:
Andrew is a serial entrepreneur and active angel investor with a focus on digital advertising and video technologies. Andrew has been involved in digital media since 1998 and has helped to create some of the most valuable and highly trafficked web properties. Most recently, Andrew co-founded BlackOcean USA and TVGenesis (which merged with AdGenesis to form Genesis Media where he has taken on the CEO position, www.genesismedia.com).

BlackOcean is a privately funded digital media accelerator which builds, operates and invests in businesses in high growth sectors including digital video, e-commerce, mobile and social networking. Separately, Andrew is also Managing Partner of SamStella, LLC a seed stage investment firm that focuses on seed and angel investments in the New York, San Francisco and Los Angeles, specifically in the ad-tech marketplace and a secondary focus in the health and digital health technologies. Samstella has invested in Mobile (Tapad.com, Tresensa.com) to gated content communities such as www.mypodstudios.com to content and digital magazines (www.elitedaily.com).

Previously, Andrew co-founded Tremor Video, which is the industry leader in digital video advertising and presently the largest video ad network and analytics platform, where he served as Chief Operating Officer and Board Member. Prior to Tremor, Andrew founded/co-founded five separate digital media companies, all of which saw successful exits.

Specialties incubation, startup, startup acceleration, monetization, business development, corporate development, problem solving, negotiation, deal structure and “Turn-around” situations.

relationships.title: Co Founder, Managing Partner BlackOcean Video
